You can recharge {{name}} through different methods{{websiteUrl}}
1- Dial* 155 * → enter your recharge voucher number → press # then Call
2- Send SMS message to 900 with: Recharge number (space) 155
3- Call 1500, and select recharge from the list, then insert the recharge card code
4- Using MyStc application for smart devices
5- Through Sawa website [ https://my.stc.com.sa/ ]
6- Using Sawa recharge page, then enter your mobile number and your code [ https://www.stc.com.sa/wps/wcm/connect/english/individual/mobile/prepaid/Charging-Sawa ]


--------------------------------------

Press *755* → followed by your recharge card number → then press # then call

---------------------------

How to charge sawa from postpaid:

1- Send a message to (900) containing (*144*).
2- Enter the Sawa mobile number that you want to recharge.
3- Add (*) then type the amount value and add (#).

---------------------------

How to check sawa balance:

To check the balance - dial *166#

metaData.redeemSteps:
How to redeem Razer Card:

1- Log in to: https://gold.razer.com
2- Log in to your Razer gold account using your Razer email and password.
3- In the top menu click on Gold then click on “Reload now” and choose the Razer Gold PIN.
4- Enter the card code that you got, then press NEXT.
5- Enter the verification code sent to your phone, then press Confirm.
6- If you did not enter your number previously, you can complete the process by pressing “Set Up TFA”.
7- Enter the verification code you received via e-mail
8- You will see a message that the code has been shipped successfully, and a receipt will be sent to your e-mail.

metaData.TANDC:

5- We recommend you use the Gift Card before it expires. Noon and Like card Store are NOT liable for any refunds or replacements if the Gift Card has not been redeemed before the expiry date.

9- You are fully responsible for safeguarding your Gift Card from unauthorized use. Noon and Like Card are NOT responsible if any Gift Card is lost, stolen, or destroyed, or if your Gift Card is used without your permission.
